column4: can any1 tell my why ubuntu 6.10 crashes on my athlon xp 2600+ directly after install on boot?
can you give us some more details? anything strange happen? non-standard hardware, maybe?
ok... try this: at boot, press esc to enter the grub menu. when it comes up, select the longest line and press "e", remove the words "splash" and press "b"
that will boot up without the progress bar
